about.title: Meet Jesper
about.quote: I help contractors win more bids without sacrificing speed or quality.
about.body1: Jesper Johnsen has 10+ years of experience as a bid manager in construction and has delivered hundreds of proposals for general and trade contractors.
about.body2: His work is built on structure, transparency and close collaboration with project managers, estimators and subcontractors.
about.body3: With OPTIVA you get a flexible partner who can step in fast when your bidding team is under pressure.
